verses.verse: And Ya`akov <WH3290> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in the land <WH776> wherein his father <WH1> was a stranger <WH4033>, in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>.

These are the generations <WH8435> of Ya`akov <WH3290>. Yosef <WH3130>, being seventeen <WH6240> <WH7651> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>, was feeding <WH7462> <WH8802> the flock <WH6629> with his brethren <WH251>; and the lad <WH5288> was with the sons <WH1121> of Bilhah <WH1090>, and with the sons <WH1121> of Zilpah <WH2153>, his father's <WH1> wives <WH802>: and Yosef <WH3130> brought <WH935> <WH8686> unto his father <WH1> their evil <WH7451> report <WH1681>.

Now Yisra'EL <WH3478> loved <WH157> <WH8804> Yosef <WH3130> more than all his children <WH1121>, because he was the son <WH1121> of his old age <WH2208>: and he made <WH6213> <WH8804> him a coat <WH3801> of many colours <WH6446>.

And when his brethren <WH251> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that their father <WH1> loved <WH157> <WH8804> him more than all his brethren <WH251>, they hated <WH8130> <WH8799> him, and could <WH3201> <WH8804> not speak <WH1696> <WH8763> peaceably <WH7965> unto him.
And Yosef <WH3130> dreamed <WH2492> <WH8799> a dream <WH2472>, and he told <WH5046> <WH8686> it his brethren <WH251>: and they hated <WH8130> <WH8800> him yet the more <WH3254> <WH8686>.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, I pray you, this dream <WH2472> which I have dreamed <WH2492> <WH8804>:

For, behold, we were binding <WH481> <WH8764> <WH8432> sheaves <WH485> in the field <WH7704>, and, lo, my sheaf <WH485> arose <WH6965> <WH8804>, and also stood upright <WH5324> <WH8738>; and, behold, your sheaves <WH485> stood round about <WH5437> <WH8799>, and made obeisance <WH7812> <WH8691> to my sheaf <WH485>.

And his brethren <WH251> said <WH559> <WH8799> to him, Shalt thou indeed <WH4427> <WH8800> reign <WH4427> <WH8799> over us? or shalt thou indeed <WH4910> <WH8800> have dominion <WH4910> <WH8799> over us? And they hated <WH8130> <WH8800> him yet the more <WH3254> <WH8686> for his dreams <WH2472>, and for his words <WH1697>.

And he dreamed <WH2492> <WH8799> yet another <WH312> dream <WH2472>, and told <WH5608> <WH8762> it his brethren <WH251>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, I have dreamed <WH2492> <WH8804> a dream <WH2472> more; and, behold, the sun <WH8121> and the moon <WH3394> and the eleven <WH6240> <WH259> stars <WH3556> made obeisance <WH7812> <WH8693> to me.

And he told <WH5608> <WH8762> it to his father <WH1>, and to his brethren <WH251>: and his father <WH1> rebuked <WH1605> <WH8799> him, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, What is this dream <WH2472> that thou hast dreamed <WH2492> <WH8804>? Shall I and thy mother <WH517> and thy brethren <WH251> indeed <WH935> <WH8800> come <WH935> <WH8799> to bow down <WH7812> <WH8692> ourselves to thee to the earth <WH776> ?
And his brethren <WH251> envied <WH7065> <WH8762> him; but his father <WH1> observed <WH8104> <WH8804> the saying <WH1697>.
And his brethren <WH251> went <WH3212> <WH8799> to feed <WH7462> <WH8800> their father's <WH1> flock <WH6629> in SH'khem <WH7927>.

And Yisra'EL <WH3478> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yosef <WH3130>, Do not thy brethren <WH251> feed <WH7462> <WH8802> the flock in SH'khem <WH7927>? come <WH3212> <WH8798>, and I will send thee <WH7971> <WH8799> unto them. And he said <WH559> <WH8799> to him, Here am I.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> to him, Go <WH3212> <WH8798>, I pray thee, see <WH7200> <WH8798> whether it be well <WH7965> with thy brethren <WH251>, and well <WH7965> with the flocks <WH6629>; and bring <WH7725> me word <WH1697> again <WH7725> <WH8685>. So he sent <WH7971> <WH8799> him out of the vale <WH6010> of Hevron <WH2275>, and he came <WH935> <WH8799> to SH'khem <WH7927>.

And a certain man <WH376> found him <WH4672> <WH8799>, and, behold, he was wandering <WH8582> <WH8802> in the field <WH7704>: and the man <WH376> asked him <WH7592> <WH8799>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, What seekest <WH1245> <WH8762> thou?
And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I seek <WH1245> <WH8764> my brethren <WH251>: tell <WH5046> <WH8685> me, I pray thee, where <WH375> they feed <WH7462> <WH8802> their flocks.

And the man <WH376> said <WH559> <WH8799>, They are departed <WH5265> <WH8804> hence <WH2088>; for I heard <WH8085> <WH8804> them say <WH559> <WH8802>, Let us go <WH3212> <WH8799> to Dothan <WH1886>. And Yosef <WH3130> went <WH3212> <WH8799> after <WH310> his brethren <WH251>, and found <WH4672> <WH8799> them in Dothan <WH1886>.
And when they saw <WH7200> <WH8799> him afar off <WH7350>, even before he came near <WH7126> <WH8799> unto them, they conspired <WH5230> <WH8691> against him to slay <WH4191> <WH8687> him.
And they said <WH559> <WH8799> one <WH376> to another <WH251>, Behold, this <WH1976> dreamer <WH1167> <WH2472> cometh <WH935> <WH8802>.

Come <WH3212> <WH8798> now therefore, and let us slay <WH2026> <WH8799> him, and cast <WH7993> <WH8686> him into some <WH259> pit <WH953>, and we will say <WH559> <WH8804>, Some evil <WH7451> beast <WH2416> hath devoured <WH398> <WH8804> him: and we shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> what will become of his dreams <WH2472>.
And Re'uven <WH7205> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> it, and he delivered <WH5337> <WH8686> him out of their hands <WH3027>; and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let us not kill <WH5221> <WH8686> <WH5315> him.

And Re'uven <WH7205> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Shed <WH8210> <WH8799> no blood <WH1818>, but cast <WH7993> <WH8685> him into this pit <WH953> that is in the wilderness <WH4057>, and lay <WH7971> <WH8799> no hand <WH3027> upon him; that he might rid <WH5337> <WH8687> him out of their hands <WH3027>, to deliver <WH7725> him to his father <WH1> again <WH7725> <WH8687>.

And it came to pass, when Yosef <WH3130> was come <WH935> <WH8804> unto his brethren <WH251>, that they stript <WH6584> <WH8686> <WH853> Yosef <WH3130> out of <WH854> his coat <WH3801>, his coat <WH3801> of many colours <WH6446> that was on him;
And they took <WH3947> <WH8799> him, and cast <WH7993> <WH8686> him into a pit <WH953>: and the pit <WH953> was empty <WH7386>, there was no water <WH4325> in it.

And they sat down <WH3427> <WH8799> to eat <WH398> <WH8800> bread <WH3899>: and they lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> their eyes <WH5869> and looked <WH7200> <WH8799>, and, behold, a company <WH736> of Ishmeelites <WH3459> came <WH935> <WH8802> from Gil`ad <WH1568> with their camels <WH1581> bearing <WH5375> <WH8802> spicery <WH5219> and balm <WH6875> and myrrh <WH3910>, going <WH1980> <WH8802> to carry it down <WH3381> <WH8687> to Egypt <WH4714>.
And Y'hudah <WH3063> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his brethren <WH251>, What profit <WH1215> is it if we slay <WH2026> <WH8799> our brother <WH251>, and conceal <WH3680> <WH8765> his blood <WH1818> ?

Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, and let us sell <WH4376> <WH8799> him to the Ishmeelites <WH3459>, and let not our hand <WH3027> be upon him; for he is our brother <WH251> and our flesh <WH1320>. And his brethren <WH251> were content <WH8085> <WH8799>.

Then there passed <WH5674> <WH8799> by Midianites <WH4084> merchantmen <WH582> <WH5503> <WH8802>; and they drew <WH4900> <WH8799> and lifted up <WH5927> <WH8686> Yosef <WH3130> out of the pit <WH953>, and sold <WH4376> <WH8799> Yosef <WH3130> to the Ishmeelites <WH3459> for twenty <WH6242> pieces of silver <WH3701>: and they brought <WH935> <WH8686> Yosef <WH3130> into Egypt <WH4714>.
And Re'uven <WH7205> returned <WH7725> <WH8799> unto the pit <WH953>; and, behold, Yosef <WH3130> was not in the pit <WH953>; and he rent <WH7167> <WH8799> his clothes <WH899>.
And he returned <WH7725> <WH8799> unto his brethren <WH251>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, The child <WH3206> is not; and I, whither <WH575> shall I go <WH935> <WH8802> ?

And they took <WH3947> <WH8799> Yosef's <WH3130> coat <WH3801>, and killed <WH7819> <WH8799> a kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795>, and dipped <WH2881> <WH8799> the coat <WH3801> in the blood <WH1818>;

And they sent <WH7971> <WH8762> the coat <WH3801> of many colours <WH6446>, and they brought <WH935> <WH8686> it to their father <WH1>; and said <WH559> <WH8799>, This have we found <WH4672> <WH8804>: know <WH5234> <WH8685> now whether it be thy son's <WH1121> coat <WH3801> or no.

And he knew it <WH5234> <WH8686>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, It is my son's <WH1121> coat <WH3801>; an evil <WH7451> beast <WH2416> hath devoured <WH398> <WH8804> him; Yosef <WH3130> is without doubt <WH2963> <WH8800> rent in pieces <WH2963> <WH8776>.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> rent <WH7167> <WH8799> his clothes <WH8071>, and put <WH7760> <WH8799> sackcloth <WH8242> upon his loins <WH4975>, and mourned <WH56> <WH8691> for his son <WH1121> many <WH7227> days <WH3117>.

And all his sons <WH1121> and all his daughters <WH1323> rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> to comfort <WH5162> <WH8763> him; but he refused <WH3985> <WH8762> to be comforted <WH5162> <WH8692>; and he said <WH559> <WH8799>, For I will go down <WH3381> <WH8799> into the grave <WH7585> unto my son <WH1121> mourning <WH57>. Thus his father <WH1> wept <WH1058> <WH8799> for him.
And the Midianites <WH4092> sold <WH4376> <WH8804> him into Egypt <WH4714> unto Potiphar <WH6318>, an officer <WH5631> of Pharaoh's <WH6547>, and captain <WH8269> of the guard <WH2876>.
